name: Hunter Game Demo
description:
HUNTER GAME DEMO

An Unreal Engine 4 game made following Carlos Coronado's course. Progammed with blueprints and with the assets of Infinity Blade: Grass Lands by Epic Games. 

You have to collect all the hammers in the level befare the time runs out. Every time you pick up a hammer, the time will increase by 10 seconds. After picking all the hammer, you will have to go to the button to open the room with the magic portal.
